definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Its major problem is that it's been nearly unmaintained for a couple of years.
sentences.chinese: 這個主頁的主要問題是已有多年沒有維護。

sentences.english: Our home page was attacked by hackers.
sentences.chinese: 我們的主頁被黑客攻擊了。

sentences.english: The logo you upload is displayed on your main page.
sentences.chinese: 上傳的徽標將顯示在您的主頁。

sentences.english: It was created from the default home page.
sentences.chinese: 它是從默認主頁創建的。

sentences.english: Both connect to the server and download the home page.
sentences.chinese: 兩者都是連接到服務器並下載其主頁。

sentences.english: The homepages of many web sites have the column related to chat.
sentences.chinese: 很多網站的主頁上都有與聊天有關的欄目。

sentences.english: The homepage manages to present a lot of text without agitating the user.
sentences.chinese: 這個主頁展示很多的文章並沒有使得用戶產生焦慮。

sentences.english: Under Home page, click Use Current.
sentences.chinese: 在“主頁”下，單擊“使用當前頁”。

sentences.english: The home page should show -let's say- the latest 30 rows.
sentences.chinese: 主頁上應該顯示，咱們說，最新的30行。

sentences.english: If it is an inside-page, must be accessible from homepage of web-site.
sentences.chinese: 如果它是一個內頁，必須從網站主頁訪問。

sentences.english: I did the same over at Google formy home page there.
sentences.chinese: 我在我的谷歌主頁也同樣進行了註冊。

sentences.english: The screens below show examples of English and Chinese home pages.
sentences.chinese: 下面的屏幕截圖顯示了英語和中文主頁的示例。

sentences.english: This photo shows the contest's homepage.
sentences.chinese: 這張照片取自競賽官網主頁。

sentences.english: This is the homepage of International Journal of Psychophysiology.
sentences.chinese: 這是《國際心理生理學雜誌》的主頁。

sentences.english: The Home screen scrolls sideways to reveal more desktop area.
sentences.chinese: 向側面滾動主頁屏幕可以看到更多桌面區域。

sentences.english: To restore your original home page, click Use Default .
sentences.chinese: 要恢復原來的主頁，請單擊“使用默認頁”。

definition: official website (abbr. for 官方網站|官方网站[guan1 fang1 wang3 zhan4])
to post (an item on a forum)
home page (of a website)/title page/front page/first page/fig. beginning/cover letter
to like (an online post on Weibo, Facebook etc)
